name: DARWIN THE EVOLUTION GAME
description:
This adventure game scheduled for science week of louis pasteur high school science was made by group 5 of 3A. 

It represents Darwin's journey and the study of animals and life.

Constrols:

Press the right arrow key to move forward.

Press the left arrow key to move back.

Press the up arrow key to jump. (you can also double jump).

From mobile the on-screen controls will appear.
